data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of a terrestrial cavernicolan planarian from Barro Colorado Island, Panama (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida, Cavernicola)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sluys, Ronald, Laumer, Christopher (2019): A new genus and species of a terrestrial cavernicolan planarian from Barro Colorado Island, Panama (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida, Cavernicola). Zootaxa 4586 (1): 187-193, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4586.1.12
